World.Name: Julian
World.Entry:
December, 1050: Julian understands the difference between friendly and hostile animals January, 1051: Julian can track the animals in the area February, 1051: Julian is in Animal Empathy Training and practicing existing skills March, 1051: Julian: Hi Sadie Sadie: Hi Julian! Mum sent me to tell you to do some chores around the farm instead of just relaxing all the time. If you want though, we could sneak off and go play instead! Julian: I'll think on it - you always were a bad influence on me Sadie: Hey - that's what sisters are for!
March, 1051: Julian does nothing all month
